snp2.4:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
snp2.4:1.3: Then, late at night, a glorious deity, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha, bowed, and stood to one side.
snp2.4:1.4: Standing to one side, that deity addressed the Buddha in verse:
snp2.4:3.3: and honoring those worthy of honor:
